resources.string: Welcome to your State Food Safety Certification Exam. Please select one answer for each question. If you have finished your exam and there is extra time you, please review all items and go back to answer any questions that you may have skipped before submitting your completed exam. Submit your exam by pressing the "SUBMIT EXAM" button at the end of the exam.
1. An operation must have a HACCP plan in place to serve which menu item?
2. Operations serving raw oysters should have a
3. Which risk may result from having a cross-connection?
4. Which minimum internal cooking temperature must prime rib reach for 15 seconds?
5. Cold ready-to-eat TCS food prepped in-house must be date marked if it will be held for longer than how many hours?
6. Which is the highest air temperature at which shell eggs can be received?
7. Foodborne pathogens grow best in foods with a water activity within which range?
8. When would a manager have to submit a HACCP plan to the regulatory authority?
9. When cooking raw foods in a microwave, food must be
10. If a previously cooked food has been cooling for 2 hours and the internal temperature is 70°F (21°C), the next step is to
